author: Jason Pope
title: Globetrotters coming to McLeod Center
text:
Globetrotters coming to McLeod Center Posted: Panthers Get the latest news and sports information about the University of Northern Iowa Panthers sports teams, including football, basketball, volleyball, baseball and softball. More >> CEDAR FALLS (KWWL) - 
The Harlem Globetrotters are coming to the Cedar Valley. 
During the Globetrotters 90th Anniversary World Tour, the team will make a stop in Cedar Falls. The team will play in the McLeod Center at the University of Northern Iowa on Thursday, April 7. 
The show begins at 7 p.m. 
Tickets start at $17.00 and are now available at harlemglobetrotters.com , www.unitix.uni.edu, the McLeod Center box office, or by phone at 319-273-4849.
